NotFoundPage.title: Page not found
NotFoundPage.description: Sorry, the page you are looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

ErrorPage.title: Authentication error
ErrorPage.description: There was an error while authenticating your account. Please try again.

LoginPage.title: Login to EdgeCMS
LoginPage.description: Login here to access the EdgeCMS dashboard, where you can monitor and manage your content.

RegisterPage.title: Register to EdgeCMS
RegisterPage.description: Register here to access the EdgeCMS dashboard, where you can monitor and manage your content.

VerifyEmailPage.title: Email verification
VerifyEmailPage.description: Verify your email address to access your account. Check your inbox and click on the link we sent you.

chat.title: Chat your AI assistant
chat.description: Chat with your AI assistant that will help you manage your content.

DeleteAccountDialog.title: Are you absolutely sure?
DeleteAccountDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.

toast_success.title: Account deleted successfully
toast_success.description: Your account has been deleted successfully. We're sorry to see you go!

toast_error.title: Error deleting account
toast_error.description: An error occurred while deleting your account. Please try again later.

LoginForm.title: Connect to your account
LoginForm.description: Enter your email address and password to connect to your account.

toast_success.title: Login successful
toast_success.description: You are now connected to your account. Welcome back!

toast_error.title: Login failed
toast_error.description: An error occurred while connecting to your account. Please try again

RegisterForm.title: Register an account
RegisterForm.description: Enter your name, email address and password to create an account.

toast_success.title: Registration successful
toast_success.description: Your account has been created successfully. Welcome to EdgeCMS!

toast_error.title: Registration failed
toast_error.description: An error occurred while creating your account. Please try again
